tasks.task: Farming Tasks in Nepal's Upland Rice Production
subtasks: Harvesting rice varieties like Radha 32 and IR 554355
Caring for farm animals with rice straw
Milling rice grains
Participating in farmer participatory research
Maintaining rice landscapes
Varietal demonstration and seed distribution
Organizing seed production and marketing groups
Introducing labor-saving techniques like seedling broadcasting
Growing vegetables for cash income
Benefiting from improved crop management technologies
Sharing research findings and innovations within communities
Planting traditional rice varieties
Managing household chores while working in the fields
Weeding rice fields
Drying and handling rice straw

tasks.task: Collaborative Research and Development in Nepal
subtasks: Conducting field research with farmer cooperation
Testing and evaluating rice varieties at village sites
Sharing best practices among research institutions and farmers
Scaling up successful technologies through district collaboration
Integrating vegetable cultivation into farming systems
Enhancing income streams through non-traditional crops
Selling produce in local markets or for personal consumption
Training in group formation and seed production
Providing technical advice on seed multiplication
Conducting workshops on modern agricultural practices
Improving access to quality seeds and new varieties
Addressing labor-intensive farming practices through innovation
